title: Polls close in Thailand with three main parties battling for power

title: Bath's WWII Normandy veteran Stan Ford dies age 100

title: 2Baba Ranks Burna Boy Ahead of Davido and Wizkid

title: Real Madrid loanee Endrick shown 'very harsh' red card as Lyon boss Paulo Fonseca makes plea to 'protect' Brazilian striker
desc: Lyon boss Paulo Fonseca has reprimanded the officials who took charge of his side’s game against FC Nantes after Real Madrid loanee Endrick was shown a red card in what the Portuguese coach described as ‘very harsh’ circumstances. Fonseca continued to criticise the referee and demanded that his forward gets protection from persistent fouling by the Ligue 1 referees.
